00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include "type_traits.h"
00027 #include "bst_base.h"
00028 #include "bst_iter.h"
00029 
00030 namespace cxx { namespace Bits {
00031 
00039 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, typename Compare >
00040 class Bst
00041 {
00042 private:
00043   typedef Direction Dir;
00045   struct Fwd
00046   {
00047     static Node *child(Node const *n, Direction d)
00048     { return Bst_node::next<Node>(n, d); }
00049 
00050     static bool cmp(Node const *l, Node const *r)
00051     { return Compare()(Get_key::key_of(l), Get_key::key_of(r)); }
00052   };
00053 
00055   struct Rev
00056   {
00057     static Node *child(Node const *n, Direction d)
00058     { return Bst_node::next<Node>(n, !d); }
00059 
00060     static bool cmp(Node const *l, Node const *r)
00061     { return Compare()(Get_key::key_of(r), Get_key::key_of(l)); }
00062   };
00063 
00064 public:
00066   typedef typename Get_key::Key_type Key_type;
00068   typedef typename Type_traits<Key_type>::Param_type Key_param_type;
00069 
00071   typedef Fwd Fwd_iter_ops;
00073   typedef Rev Rev_iter_ops;
00074 
00076 
00077 
00078   typedef __Bst_iter<Node, Node, Fwd> Iterator;
00080   typedef __Bst_iter<Node, Node const, Fwd> Const_iterator;
00082   typedef __Bst_iter<Node, Node, Rev> Rev_iterator;
00084   typedef __Bst_iter<Node, Node const, Rev> Const_rev_iterator;
00086 
00087 protected:
00096 
00098   Bst_node *_head;
00099 
00101   Bst() : _head(0) {}
00102 
00104   Node *head() const { return static_cast<Node*>(_head); }
00105 
00107   static Key_type k(Bst_node const *n)
00108   { return Get_key::key_of(static_cast<Node const *>(n)); }
00109 
00117   static Dir dir(Key_param_type l, Key_param_type r)
00118   {
00119     Compare cmp;
00120     Dir d(cmp(r, l));
00121     if (d == Direction::L && !cmp(l, r))
00122       return Direction::N;
00123     return d;
00124   }
00125 
00133   static Dir dir(Key_param_type l, Bst_node const *r)
00134   { return dir(l, k(r)); }
00135 
00137   static bool greater(Key_param_type l, Key_param_type r)
00138   { return Compare()(r, l); }
00139 
00141   static bool greater(Key_param_type l, Bst_node const *r)
00142   { return greater(l, k(r)); }
00143 
00145   static bool greater(Bst_node const *l, Bst_node const *r)
00146   { return greater(k(l), k(r)); }
00149 public:
00150 
00159   Const_iterator begin() const { return Const_iterator(head()); }
00164   Const_iterator end() const { return Const_iterator(); }
00165 
00170   Iterator begin() { return Iterator(head()); }
00175   Iterator end() { return Iterator(); }
00176 
00181   Const_rev_iterator rbegin() const { return Const_rev_iterator(head()); }
00186   Const_rev_iterator rend() const { return Const_rev_iterator(); }
00187 
00192   Rev_iterator rbegin() { return Rev_iterator(head()); }
00197   Rev_iterator rend() { return Rev_iterator(); }
00211   Node *find_node(Key_param_type key) const;
00212 
00219   Node *lower_bound_node(Key_param_type key) const;
00220 
00227   Const_iterator find(Key_param_type key) const;
00228 
00230 };
00231 
00232 /* find an element */
00233 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, class Compare>
00234 inline
00235 Node *
00236 Bst<Node, Get_key, Compare>::find_node(Key_param_type key) const
00237 {
00238   Dir d;
00239 
00240   for (Bst_node *q = _head; q; q = Bst_node::next(q, d))
00241     {
00242       d = dir(key, q);
00243       if (d == Dir::N)
00244   return static_cast<Node*>(q);
00245     }
00246   return 0;
00247 }
00248 
00249 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, class Compare>
00250 inline
00251 Node *
00252 Bst<Node, Get_key, Compare>::lower_bound_node(Key_param_type key) const
00253 {
00254   Dir d;
00255   Bst_node *r = 0;
00256 
00257   for (Bst_node *q = _head; q; q = Bst_node::next(q, d))
00258     {
00259       d = dir(key, q);
00260       if (d == Dir::L)
00261   r = q; // found a node greater than key
00262       else if (d == Dir::N)
00263   return static_cast<Node*>(q);
00264     }
00265   return static_cast<Node*>(r);
00266 }
00267 
00268 /* find an element */
00269 template< typename Node, typename Get_key, class Compare>
00270 inline
00271 typename Bst<Node, Get_key, Compare>::Const_iterator
00272 Bst<Node, Get_key, Compare>::find(Key_param_type key) const
00273 {
00274   Bst_node *q = _head;
00275   Bst_node *r = q;
00276 
00277   for (Dir d; q; q = Bst_node::next(q, d))
00278     {
00279       d = dir(key, q);
00280       if (d == Dir::N)
00281   return Iterator(static_cast<Node*>(q), static_cast<Node *>(r));
00282 
00283       if (d != Dir::L && q == r)
00284   r = Bst_node::next(q, d);
00285     }
00286   return Iterator();
00287 }
00288 
00289 }}
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
